title: Word Counter
placeholder: Type or paste your text here...
aboutText: This is a simple word counter application built with React and Material-UI.
contactText: Have questions or feedback? Fill out the form below to get in touch with us.

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.step1: Paste your text into the text area.
howToUse.step2: Get instant insights on word count, character count, and more.
howToUse.step3: Export your text as a .txt file.
howToUse.step4: Clear the text area to start over.

freeWordCounterOnline: Free Word Counter Online - Count Words, Characters, Sentences
freeWordCounterDescription: Free online word counter tool. Count words, characters, sentences, paragraphs, reading time & keyword density. Fast, accurate text analysis for students, writers & professionals.
bestFreeTool: The best free online tool to count words, characters, sentences, paragraphs, reading time, and keyword density.
completeGuide: Complete Guide to Word Counters and Text Analysis
professionalWritingTips: Professional writing tips, text analysis techniques, and content optimization strategies.
importanceOfWordCount: The Importance of Word Count in Writing
wordCountInfo: Whether you're writing an academic paper, a blog post, or a professional document, understanding word count is crucial. Different contexts require different lengths:
blogPostsInfo: Typically range from 1,000 to 2,500 words for optimal SEO
academicPapersInfo: Often have strict word limits set by institutions
socialMediaInfo: Twitter has a 280-character limit, while LinkedIn posts work well up to 1,300 words
emailsInfo: Keep them concise, ideally under 200 words for better engagement
howToUseWordCounter: How to Effectively Use a Word Counter
wordCounterUtility: A word counter is more than just a simple counting tool. Here's how to maximize its utility:
setWordTargets: Set word targets before you start writing
ensureContentMeetsGuidelines: Ensure your content meets submission guidelines
knowHowLongContentTakes: Know how long your content will take to read
meetRecommendedWordCounts: Meet recommended word counts for search engines
monitorWritingPace: Monitor your writing pace and productivity
writingTipsBasedOnTextAnalysis: Writing Tips Based on Text Analysis
textCompositionHelps: Understanding your text's composition can help improve your writing:
mixShortAndLong: Mix short and long sentences for better readability
aimForSentences: Aim for 3-5 sentences per paragraph for easy scanning
keepItNatural: Keep it natural - typically 1-2% for SEO purposes
adjustForAudience: Adjust complexity based on your target audience
textAnalysisForContentTypes: Text Analysis for Different Content Types
academicWritingInfo: Focus on maintaining proper word limits, checking for redundancy, and ensuring consistent terminology. Academic papers often require specific word counts and structure.
blogArticlesInfo: Aim for 1,500-2,500 words for optimal SEO performance. Check your keyword density and reading time to ensure your content is substantial and engaging.
businessDocumentsInfo: Keep business communications concise. Use tools to ensure your documents are as brief as possible while still conveying all necessary information.
implementingPractices: Implementing these practices will improve your writing quality:
tailorWordChoice: Tailor your word choice and tone accordingly
definePurpose: Define the purpose of your writing upfront
generallyMoreConcise: It's generally more concise and easier to understand
checkMetricsBeforePublishing: Check word count and other metrics before publishing
averageReadingTime: The average reading time is about 200 words per minute. Understanding this helps you set expectations:
considerAudienceAttention: Consider your audience's attention span when crafting content to optimize engagement.
significantlyImproveContent: Using text analysis tools can significantly improve your content's performance:
varySentenceLength: Vary sentence length to maintain reader interest
useHeadingsParagraphs: Use headings and paragraphs to improve scannability
wordCounterGuide: Word Counter Guide: Writing Tips & Text Analysis Resources
completeGuideDescription: Complete guide to using word counters and text analysis tools. Learn writing techniques, SEO best practices, and how to optimize content with our free online tools.
accurateFastEasyToUse: Accurate, fast, and easy-to-use text analysis for students, writers, and professionals. Count words, characters, sentences, and more.
completelyFree: This tool is completely free to use with no registration required. Simply paste your text into the field and get instant results.
freeWordCounterSupport: Contact Our Free Word Counter Tool Support
supportForQuestions: Contact our support team for questions about our free word counter tool. We're here to help with any inquiries about text analysis, word counting, and content optimization.
questionsSuggestionsFeedback: Whether you have questions about our free word counter tool, suggestions for features, or feedback about your experience, we'd love to hear from you.
visitResourcesForHelp: For help using the word counter, visit our Resources page for guides and tips.
privacyPolicyTitle: Privacy Policy - Free Word Counter Tool
privacyPolicyDescription: Our privacy policy for the free word counter tool. We don't collect personal information and all text processing happens locally in your browser.
noPersonalInformation: Our Word Counter application does not collect any personal information from users. All text processing happens locally in your browser and is not sent to any server.
sinceNoInformation: Since we don't collect personal information, we don't use your information in any way. Your text input remains in your browser and is not stored or transmitted anywhere.
dataSecurityInfo: We prioritize your privacy and data security. All text analysis happens locally in your browser. No data is transferred to our servers or any third-party services.
thirdPartyInfo: This application uses third-party services including Google Analytics and Google AdSense. These services may collect information in accordance with their respective privacy policies.
cookiesInfo: Our application may use cookies to store preferences and analyze site traffic. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings.
changesInfo: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. You will be notified of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
contactForQuestions: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the Contact page.
termsOfServiceTitle: Terms of Service - Free Word Counter Tool
termsDescription: Terms of service for our free word counter tool. By using our service, you agree to these terms and conditions of use.
agreementInfo: By accessing and using this Word Counter application, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
useLicenseInfo: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on our application for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
disclaimerInfo: The materials on our application are provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim and negate all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
limitationInfo: In no event shall we or our suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the application.
accuracyInfo: The text analysis tools provided on this application are for general information only. We do not warrant the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of the analysis results.
changesTermsInfo: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the application after any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.
contactInfoText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through the Contact page.

cookieConsent.bannerText: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze traffic, and show personalized advertising. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our use of cookies according to our Cookie Policy.

consentManagement.title: Cookie Preferences
consentManagement.description: Manage your consent preferences for different types of cookies below. Necessary cookies are always enabled to ensure basic functionality.
consentManagement.necessaryDescription: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be switched off. They are usually set in response to actions made by you which constitute a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in, or filling in forms.
consentManagement.analyticsDescription: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources to measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.
consentManagement.advertisingDescription: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners and are used to build a profile of your interests to show you relevant advertisements. They do not store directly personal information but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device.

privacyPolicyDescription: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information when using our free word counter tool.
noPersonalInformation: We do not collect any personally identifiable information about you when you use our website. The word counter tool operates entirely within your web browser - all processing happens locally on your device.
sinceNoInformation: Since we don't collect any personal information, we don't use any personal information about you.
dataSecurityInfo: Your text data remains in your browser and is never transmitted to our servers or any third parties. When you use our word counter tool, your text stays on your local device and is not stored anywhere.
thirdPartyInfo: We may use third-party services such as Google Analytics and Google AdSense. These services may collect information about your usage of our website and may use cookies to track your online activity across websites.
cookiesInfo: Like many websites, we use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our website and store certain information. Our website uses cookies for various purposes including essential, analytics, and advertising.
changesInfo: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the Effective Date at the top of this page.
contactForQuestions: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our
cookiesDefinition: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to the site owners.
cookieUsageInfo: We use cookies for a variety of reasons, including to enhance your user experience, analyze site traffic, and for marketing purposes.
functionalityCookiesDescription: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you have made in the past, like what language you prefer.
analyticsCookiesDescription: These cookies collect information about how you use a website, like which pages you visited and which links you clicked on. None of this information can be used to identify you. It is all aggregated and, therefore, anonymized.
advertisingCookiesDescription: These cookies track your online activity to help advertisers deliver more relevant advertising or to limit how many times you see an ad.
thirdPartyCookiesInfo: Some of our pages may display content from external providers, e.g., YouTube, Facebook and Twitter. To view this third-party content, you first have to accept their specific terms and conditions. This includes their cookie policies, which we have no control over.
googleAnalyticsDescription: We use Google Analytics to collect information about how visitors use our website. We use this information to compile reports and to help us improve the site.
googleAdSenseDescription: We use Google AdSense to display ads on our website. This service uses cookies to serve ads based on a user's prior visits to our website or other websites.
managingCookiesInfo: You can manage your cookie preferences through our cookie consent tool or by adjusting your browser settings.
browserSettingsInfo: Most web browsers allow some control of most cookies through the browser settings. To find out more about cookies, including how to see what cookies have been set, visit www.aboutcookies.org or www.allaboutcookies.org.
cookieConsentToolInfo: You can adjust your cookie preferences at any time by clicking on the cookie icon at the bottom of the screen.
accessCookieTool: You can access the cookie consent tool at any time to change your preferences or withdraw your consent.
changesToCookiePolicyInfo: We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page.
cookiePolicyDescription: Learn about how we use cookies and how you can manage them.
gdprComplianceInfo: We are committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). As we do not collect any personal data, our practices are designed to protect your privacy.
weProcessNoPersonalData: We process no personal data, ensuring fairness and transparency.
weCollectNoData: We collect no data, so there is no purpose limitation to consider.
weCollectZeroPersonalData: We collect zero personal data, adhering to the principle of data minimization.
weStoreNoPersonalData: We store no personal data, so there are no storage limitations.
yourDataStaysBrowser: Your data stays in your browser. We do not transmit or store it.
weDocumentPrivacyPractices: We document our privacy practices and are accountable for them.
gdprArticle17: Under GDPR, you have the right to request the erasure of your personal data. Since we do not collect any personal data, this right is not applicable.
ccpaComplianceInfo: We comply with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). As we do not collect any personal information, your rights under CCPA are not applicable.
thisPrivacyPolicyInforms: This Privacy Policy informs you about our data practices at or before the point of collection.
youCanRequestInformation: You can request information about the categories and specific pieces of personal information we have collected about you. Since we collect no personal information, we have nothing to disclose.
youCanRequestDeletion: You can request the deletion of your personal information. Since we do not collect any personal information, there is nothing to delete.
youCanOptOut: You can opt-out of the sale of your personal information. We do not sell any personal information.
childrensPrivacyInfo: Our service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal identifiable information from children under 13.
internationalDataTransfersInfo: Your information, including personal data, may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction. Since we do not collect any data, this is not applicable.
advertisingDisclosureInfo: This site is supported by advertisers. We may earn a commission when you purchase products or services through our links.
usersMayOptOut: Users may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Ads Settings. Alternatively, you can opt out of a third-party vendor's use of cookies for personalized advertising by visiting www.aboutads.info.
thirdPartyServicesInfo: Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.
